Changes.LogName: Load RSV NPC Adventures companion speech bubbles

Entries.ambient_Town_Alissa: I should buy some more seeds.
Entries.ambient_Town_Alissa~1: I hope no one hears me humming...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: The village is lively as ever.
I can smell Pika's from here!
Ladaladee...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Alis: I only heard of this place from stories!
The waterfalls sound like they're... singing...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3r: I hear music from the walls...
Entries.ambient_Mine_Corine~3: It's a bit dark in here...
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Corine~1: I bet I can climb that.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Did I have work today? Nah.
I should visit Ysa.
Wasn't that a kiwi fruit?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Cor: Who left these pages on the grass?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Corine: I wonder how far is the drop?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Cori: I can't see the bottom of the lake...
Entries.ambient_Mine_Daia: Ooh! Taking me to a dark place?
Entries.ambient_Mine_Daia~2: The minerals here are... Imbued with magic?
Entries.ambient_Town_Daia~1: I could get used to this.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Daia: Can I take off my top? It's hot!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Is this a date? It's a date, isn't it? <
Oh, I see Kiwi over there!
This village is nice...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Dai: Hmph, back to work I guess.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Daia~1: This place gives me the creeps...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: I'm hungry...
Isn't that... A kiwi fruit?
Quite lovely...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Flor: I thought this place only existed in stories?
Entries.ambient_Mine_Ian~2: We should've bought a bigger bag.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Ian: I did some lumberjack work here the other day.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Ian: The heat doesn't bother me much.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Ian~1: We got time for a quick dip?
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Ian: I can see Robin's house from here!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Ah! That smell! It's Pika's!
I forgot to collect the trash!
I wonder if Lenny has some work for me.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Ian~1: I like to hang out here.
Entries.ambient_Town_Jeric~3: I should buy some seeds while I'm here.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Jeric: What's up with that tower there?
Entries.ambient_Desert_Jeric~1: Aww... My outfit's all sweaty now.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Jeric: I wonder what's Linus up to?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Nothing beats home.
Let's stop by Pika's.
Oof! I stepped on gum!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Jer: It's a shame, this place looks pretty!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Jeric~: It's such a nice view, isn't it?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Jeri: Let's pay our respects to the Mountain Spirit.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3r: That ballerina in the painting's beautiful!
Entries.ambient_Mine_Jio~1: Someone has been tampering the balance here...
Entries.ambient_Town_Jio~1: Can we leave as soon as possible?
Entries.ambient_Town_Jio~2: I dislike this part of the job.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Jio: I assume the Wizard sensed we entered his domain.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Jio: This place was once a battleground...
Entries.ambient_Beach_Jio: The merfolk have been here recently.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Jio: The barrier ends here as well...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Let's keep this short.
I won't answer their questions.
I heard the food here's great.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Jio: Rest in peace, poor lost souls...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Jio: It was here where it all started...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Jio: Great Mountain Spirit, we give you praise.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Jio~: The Seer has always kept a watchful eye on this place.
The waters are rich in magic.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3r: I feel a spirit... A happy one.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Kenneth: Wow, those stuff growing from the floors are huge!
Entries.ambient_Mine_Kenneth~2: Do you feel something funny around?
Entries.ambient_Mine_Kenneth~3: I think I brought my lucky flashlight here.
Entries.ambient_Town_Kenneth: The light posts look kinda old.
Entries.ambient_Town_Kenneth~1: Maybe I can build some hoverboards for easy transport.
Entries.ambient_Town_Kenneth~3: Do you think they have power chargers here?
Entries.ambient_Forest_Kenneth: I wonder what'll it take to fix that tower.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Kenneth~1: A few waterproof fairy lights would solve the light problem here.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Kenneth: My handy fan would be handy hereâ€“ get it?
Entries.ambient_Desert_Kenneth~1: They ought to think about installing water pipes from the mainland.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Kenneth: Yikes, wouldn't want to get my tools wet.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Kenneth~1: Losing a layer of clothing would be good in this setting.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Kenneth: I think a zipline or a lift would be beneficial in the mountains.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: The industrial wiring did good for the lamp posts.
Not a spot of wire, hah!
Yum, I think Pika's preparing my favorite!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Ken: Ah! Solar panels will solve our problems!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Kennet: You don't know how many antennas I've lost up here!
I tell you, This view never gets old.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Kenn: Would infinite energy be possible with magic?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3r: I wonder where was that treadmill I fixed.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Maddie~1: I'd like to study the ecology here sometime.
Entries.ambient_Town_Maddie~1: I have to say, it's tidy.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Maddie~1: Let's stay here for a bit longer?
Entries.ambient_Desert_Maddie~1: Maybe I can bring back some soil samples.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Maddie: It's annoying to see trash in the sea.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: The observatory holds a lot of different flora and fauna.
I hear my stomach growling.
This place sometimes get a bit crowded...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Mad: I hope the animals aren't hurt here.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Maddie: There are plants under the cliff. I wonder if I could reach them.
This seems kind of surreal doesn't it?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Madd: I only know about this place from story books!
Mountain Spirit? You're saying it's real?
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3r: Heh... To think I used to do belly dancing.
Entries.fight_Maddie~1: I hope this doesn't hurt too much!
Entries.ambient_Mine_Philip: Hmm, this place is quite big.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Philip~1: I've seen caves like this in my comics.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Philip~2: We might encounter different monsters here.
Entries.ambient_Town_Philip: Harvey's the first friend I have in town.
Entries.ambient_Town_Philip~1: If you need help, the clinic's nearby.
Entries.ambient_Town_Philip~3: Taking strolls are good for your heart.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Philip: I kind of want to explore that tower over there.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Philip: I hope you brought some water with you.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Philip~1: I hope we find an oasis.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Philip~1: Do you think I can control the sand with my mind?
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Philip: The man's name there is Mr. Linus. He's the mountain man.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Philip~1: Tell me if you find anything nice!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Oh no, I'm getting hungry. I smell Pika's!
Having a good stay, are we?
I hope you're having a good time.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Phi: The fresh air is good for the lungs.
Ah, this is what I call peace and quiet.
I could bring a book here.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Philip: I wonder how it feels to fly...
What if I jump from here, then I suddenly gain superpowers.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Phil: I heard there's a goddess that lives here.
Maybe the spirit could grant me magical powers!
When I pass, I want my spirit to wander here.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Shiro~1: You should've told me we were coming here.
Entries.ambient_Town_Shiro~2: Phew! Let me catch my breath.
Entries.ambient_Town_Shiro~3: I should buy Yuuma something while we're here.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Shiro: I don't think I'll last long here...
Entries.ambient_Beach_Shiro~1: Can I skip rocks as far as before?
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Shiro: Phew! Wait... Let me catch my breath!
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: This place has always been tidy.
I'm craving for some burgers...
*Breathing heavily*
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Shiro~: I remember I used to jog around here a lot.
Huff huff... I need to take it easy...
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Shir: Will I get better faster if I swim here? Nah.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3r: Would you believe I used to lift a lot?
Entries.ambient_Town_Ysabelle~1: People seem to enjoy the breeze.
Entries.ambient_Town_Ysabelle~2: I find this place relatively pleasant.
Entries.ambient_Forest_Ysabelle: It's the perfect place to feel yourself moving.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Ysabelle~1: The heat's making me feel dehydrated.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Ysabelle: This reminds me of the balmy days of summer. <
Entries.ambient_Beach_Ysabelle~1: This is the best view ever.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Ysabelle~1: Best to wear another layer of clothes.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillag: Always prefer home over other places. <
Mmm, I smell Pika's cooking from here.
Lenny did a great job with decorating the village.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_Ysa: I believe I can take on anyone.
I think I need to go home to grandfather.
Entries.ambient_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Ysabel: I love how my hair flows with the wind.
